title: Friend has never playing with a rioter
body: He has almost 4000 wins, and has never once played with a red. Maybe as a surprise, we can fix this? his in game name is The Liger for those that wanna see how many wins he has.

replies.body: I'm trying to set this up as my bday gift to him. He plays all the time, and I think it's high time he get to play with those that work on the game.

I agree!  Bump!

I've only had one game with Rioters...(well, two, but I was watching the second game's Rioter and got in on a fan game...), and it was a total surprise....an ARAM against 4 Rioters LOL.  We lost.  Badly.  But it was amazing and so much fun!
You say he has never played with a Rioter before, for some reason I just didn't think many people had played with them o.o
I'll play! Just let me know when! :D

my birthday is coming up...in about 9 months...:'(

but I'm no where close to 4k games. It'd just be a cool thing to do!
Whats a good time for you? I'm free most nights, and so is he.

> Whats a good time for you? I'm free most nights, and so is he.

Nights work out really well for me. :3 Usually any time after 8 PM PST.

> how about tomorrow night around 8pst?

Works for me! :D
Is there a rioter that could play on EUNE?
bumping so i can hopefully get a red's attention
I played with a rioter once in aram, he rekt with yorick
bump. Let does this for his b-day on the 30th of this month. 3814 wins without a red is a crime :3
